channel.title: changelog on Zinzy's website
channel.description: Recent content in changelog on Zinzy's website

item.description: Updated the general UI of this website by adding a softer background color Added a splice method I used earlier to photo posts, which allows me to alter the size of the images served through Cloudinary Merged _notes contents into my _posts folder so that my dated content is organized in a single place (this is convenient for pagination purposes) Styled the tags page Updated layout of an individual tag page so that short notes and posts are grouped accordingly
